# DO.utils

DO.utils is an R package *primarily* designed to support the operations
of the Human Disease Ontology (DO;
[disease-ontology.org](https://disease-ontology.org/)) but with **a
number of capabilities that will be useful to the broader scientific
community** for:

1.  **Assessing Resource Use & Impact** (Bibliometrics/Scientometrics)

    - A brief summary can be found under [Assessing Resource Use
      (Bibliometrics/Scientometrics)](#assess_use).
    - For a detailed description refer to the “Assessing Resource Use:
      Obtaining Use Records” tutorial included with this package
      ([`vignette("obtain_use_records", package = "DO.utils")`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/articles/obtain_use_records.md))
      or the peer-reviewed article:

    > J. Allen Baron, Lynn M Schriml, *Assessing resource use: a case
    > study with the Human Disease Ontology*, Database, Volume 2023,
    > 2023, baad007. <PMID:36856688>,
    > <https://doi.org/10.1093/database/baad007>.

2.  Simplifying common R tasks (see [General Utilities](#general)
    section).

Operations specific to the use, analysis, maintenance, and improvement
of the ontology itself are described briefly in the [DO Improvement &
Analysis](#do_specific) section.

DO.utils is *work in progress*. If you are interested in contributing,
please reach out. Note that our goal is to work collaboratively to make
functions as broadly useful as possible.

## Installation

### Installing Prerequisites

To use DO.utils you must first install `R` from
[CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/). Installing
[RStudio](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/) can also be useful but
is not required. The `devtools` package is also required and can be
obtain by executing `install.packages("devtools")` within R.

### Installing DO.utils

DO.utils can be installed from Github or from a persistent, open-access
repository hosted by Zenodo.

To install from Github, run
`devtools::install_github("DiseaseOntology/DO.utils")` within R.

To install from Zenodo, first download DO.utils (DOI:
[10.5281/zenodo.7467668](https://www.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.7467668)) to
your local machine. Then, within R run
`devtools::install_git(<local_path_to_DO.utils>)`, replacing
`<local_path_to_DO.utils>` with the local path to DO.utils.

## Assessing Resource Use & Impact (Bibliometrics/Scientometrics)

DO.utils includes functions to assist in both assessing how a resource
is used and in measuring the impact of that use. Most of these functions
may be broadly useful to anyone trying to accomplish these tasks, while
a much smaller number are specific to measuring the DO’s impact.

Components that will be broadly useful to any resource can:

1.  Identify scientific publications that use a resource from:
    1.  Citations of one or more article(s) published by the resource
        (“cited by”;
        [`citedby_pubmed()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/citedby_pubmed.md)
        and
        [`citedby_scopus()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/citedby_scopus.md)).
    2.  PubMed or PubMed Central (PMC) search results
        ([`search_pubmed()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/search_pubmed.md)
        and
        [`search_pmc()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/search_pmc.md)).
    3.  A MyNCBI collection
        ([`read_pubmed_txt()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/read_pubmed_txt.md)).
2.  Identify matching publication records in different record sets (must
    be formatted data.frames; see
    [`match_citations()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/match_citations.md)).

To those interested in Bioconductor package download
statistics,[`get_bioc_pkg_stats()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/get_bioc_pkg_stats.md)
may be useful, while other measures of impact are designed specifically
with the DO in mind
(e.g. [`count_alliance_records()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/count_alliance_records.md)).

## DO Improvement & Analysis

DO.utils provides the following capabilities used for improvement and
analysis:

1.  Git repo management, iterative execution across git repository tags,
    and SPARQL queries implemented with wrappers
    ([`DOrepo()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/DOrepo.md),
    [`owl_xml()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/owl_xml.md))
    around the related [pyDOID](https://pypi.org/project/pyDOID/) python
    package.
2.  Automation of [disease-ontology.org](https://disease-ontology.org/)
    updates, including:
    - Statistics plots (see
      <https://disease-ontology.org/about/statistics>)
    - Semi-automated html rendering to build various pages including the
      [Use Cases](https://disease-ontology.org/community/use-cases), [DO
      Imports](https://disease-ontology.org/resources/DO_Imports), [DO
      Slims](https://disease-ontology.org/resources/DO_Slims), and the
      new [Symptom
      Ontology](https://disease-ontology.org/resources/symptom-ontology)
      and [Pathogen Transmission
      Ontology](https://disease-ontology.org/resources/pathogen-transmission-ontology)
      pages.
3.  Definition source URL validation.
4.  Prediction of mappings/cross-references between other resources &
    DO, via [PyOBO/GILDA](https://github.com/pyobo/pyobo) or approximate
    string matching.
5.  Simplified system installation of the OBO tool
    [ROBOT](http://robot.obolibrary.org/).

## General Utilities

DO.utils includes general utilities to make programming in R easier
including, for example, those that assist with:

- Type/content testing –
  [`is_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/char_val_predicates.md),
  [`is_positive()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/num_val_predicates.md),
  `is_vctr_or_df()`,
  [`all_duplicated()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/all_duplicated.md)
- Vector-to-scalar conversion –
  [`collapse_to_string()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/collapse_to_string.md),
  [`unique_if_invariant()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/unique_if_invariant.md)
- Data reduction –
  [`collapse_col()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/collapse_col.md),
  [`drop_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/drop_blank.md)
- Value replacement –
  [`replace_null()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/replace_null.md),
  [`replace_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/replace_blank.md)
- Sorting (by a specified priority)
- Dates –
  [`cur_yr()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/cur_yr.md),
  [`today_datestamp()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/today_datestamp.md)
- Temporary bug workarounds –
  [`restore_names()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/restore_names.md)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`DO_colors`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/DO_colors.md)
  : Human Disease Ontology Official Colors

- [`DOrepo()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/DOrepo.md)
  : Instantiate a DO Repository

- [`all_duplicated()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/all_duplicated.md)
  : Identify all duplicates

- [`append_empty_col()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/append_empty_col.md)
  : Append Empty Columns

- [`append_to_url()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/append_to_url.md)
  : Append to URL

- [`as_html_img()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/as_html_img.md)
  :

  Construct HTML `img` Tag(s)

- [`as_tibble(`*`<esummary_list>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/as_tibble.esummary_list.md)
  [`as_tibble(`*`<esummary_list_nested>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/as_tibble.esummary_list.md)
  :

  Convert `esummary` Object into Tibble

- [`as_tibble(`*`<scopus_search>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/as_tibble.scopus_search.md)
  [`as_tibble(`*`<scopus_search_list>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/as_tibble.scopus_search.md)
  :

  Convert `scopus_search` Object into Tibble

- [`batch_id_converter()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/batch_id_converter.md)
  : Convert IDs in Batches

- [`build_html_element()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/build_html_element.md)
  : Build HTML Element(s)

- [`build_hyperlink()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/build_hyperlink.md)
  [`hyperlink_curie()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/build_hyperlink.md)
  : Build Hyperlinks

- [`is_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/char_val_predicates.md)
  [`is_missing()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/char_val_predicates.md)
  : Character value predicates

- [`partition()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/chunk.md)
  : Partition vectors

- [`citedby_pmid()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/citedby_pmid.md)
  : Get Cited By PMIDs from PubMed

- [`citedby_pubmed()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/citedby_pubmed.md)
  : Get Cited By List from PubMed

- [`citedby_scopus()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/citedby_scopus.md)
  : Get Cited By List from Scopus

- [`collapse_col()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/collapse_col.md)
  : Collapse Column(s)

- [`collapse_col_flex()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/collapse_col_flex.md)
  : Collapse Column(s) Flexibly

- [`collapse_to_string()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/collapse_to_string.md)
  : Create a String from Inputs

- [`confine_list()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/confine_list.md)
  [`release_list()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/confine_list.md)
  : Convert (Nested) List to/from Character Vector

- [`count_alliance_records()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/count_alliance_records.md)
  : Count Alliance Records

- [`count_delim()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/count_delim.md)
  : Count Delimited Columns

- [`cur_yr()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/cur_yr.md)
  : Get Current Year

- [`download_alliance_tsv()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/download_alliance_tsv.md)
  : Download Alliance .tsv.gz File

- [`download_file()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/download_file.md)
  : Download File(s) from the Internet

- [`download_obo_ontology()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/download_obo_ontology.md)
  : Download OBO Foundry Ontology File

- [`download_omim()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/download_omim.md)
  : Download OMIM Files

- [`drop_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/drop_blank.md)
  : Drop Blanks

- [`elucidate()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/elucidate.md)
  : Elucidate the Data in an Object

- [`extract_as_tidygraph()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_as_tidygraph.md)
  : Extract OWL/RDF as a tidygraph

- [`extract_class_axiom()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_class_axiom.md)
  : Extract Class Axioms

- [`extract_eq_axiom()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_eq_axiom.md)
  : Extract Equivalent Class Axioms

- [`extract_obo_mappings()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_obo_mappings.md)
  : Extract Mappings from an OBO Foundry Ontology

- [`extract_ordo_mappings()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_ordo_mappings.md)
  : Extract mappings from ORDO

- [`extract_pm_date()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_pm_date.md)
  : Extract Publication Date from PubMed Citations

- [`extract_pmid()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_pmid.md)
  : Extract PubMed ID

- [`extract_pmid(`*`<elink>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_pmid.elink.md)
  : Extract PubMed ID from elink object

- [`extract_pmid(`*`<elink_list>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_pmid.elink_list.md)
  : Extract PubMed ID from elink_list object

- [`extract_subclass_axiom()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_subclass_axiom.md)
  : Extract 'Subclass Of' Axioms

- [`extract_subtree()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/extract_subtree.md)
  : Extract Subtree

- [`format_axiom()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/format_axiom.md)
  : Format Logical Axioms

- [`format_doid()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/format_doid.md)
  : Format DOIDs

- [`format_hyperlink()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/format_hyperlink.md)
  : Format URLs as Hyperlinks

- [`format_obo()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/format_obo.md)
  : Format OBO Foundry IDs

- [`format_subtree()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/format_subtree.md)
  : Format a Subtree

- [`get_bioc_pkg_stats()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/get_bioc_pkg_stats.md)
  : Get Bioconductor Package Statistics

- [`iff_all_vals()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/iff_all_vals.md)
  : Test for All Values

- [`install_robot()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/install_robot.md)
  : Install OBO Foundry ROBOT Tool (Mac/Linux ONLY)

- [`inventory_omim()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/inventory_omim.md)
  : Assess whether OMIM Data is in DO

- [`invert_sublists()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/invert_sublists.md)
  : Invert Sublists

- [`is_curie()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/is_curie.md)
  : CURIE (RDF ID) Predicate

- [`is_invariant()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/is_invariant.md)
  : Test if an Object is Invariant

- [`is_uri()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/is_uri.md)
  : Test for Valid URIs

- [`length_sort()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/length_sort.md)
  [`length_order()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/length_sort.md)
  : Sort by Character Length

- [`lengthen_col()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/lengthen_col.md)
  : Lengthen Column(s)

- [`lexiclean()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/lexiclean.md)
  : Prepare Text for Matching

- [`is_boolean()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/lgl_predicates.md)
  : Logical predicate

- [`make_contributor_html()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/make_contributor_html.md)
  : Make "Contributors" HTML

- [`make_use_case_html()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/make_use_case_html.md)
  : Make HTML for DO Use Case Tables

- [`make_user_list_html()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/make_user_list_html.md)
  : Make HTML for DO User List (DEPRECATED)

- [`match_carefully()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/match_carefully.md)
  : Matches Carefully

- [`match_citations()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/match_citations.md)
  : Citation Matching

- [`match_fz()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/match_fz.md)
  : Fuzzy (Approximate) String Matching

- [`max_paren_depth()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/max_paren_depth.md)
  : Calculate Maximum Parentheses Depth

- [`ns_prefix`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/ns_prefix.md)
  [`obo_prefix`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/ns_prefix.md)
  [`obo_prop_prefix`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/ns_prefix.md)
  [`not_obo_prefix`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/ns_prefix.md)
  : Namespace Prefixes

- [`is_positive()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/num_val_predicates.md)
  [`is_negative()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/num_val_predicates.md)

  [`is_scalar_whole_number()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/num_val_predicates.md)
  : Number value predicates

- [`is_valid_obo()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/obo_ID_predicates.md)
  [`is_valid_doid()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/obo_ID_predicates.md)
  : OBO ID predicates

- [`obofoundry_metadata`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/obofoundry_metadata.md)
  : OBO Foundry Metadata

- [`onto_missing()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/onto_missing.md)
  : Identify Data Missing from an Ontology (DEPRECATED)

- [`owl_xml()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/owl_xml.md)
  : Instantiate an owl_xml object

- [`parse_mapping()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/parse_mapping.md)
  : Parse Mapping

- [`plot_branch_counts()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/plot_branch_counts.md)
  : Plot Branch Counts

- [`plot_citedby()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/plot_citedby.md)
  : Plot Publications Citing DO by Year

- [`plot_def_src()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/plot_def_src.md)
  : Plot Definition Sources

- [`plot_term_def_counts()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/plot_term_def_counts.md)
  : Plot DO Term & Definition Counts

- [`plot_xref_counts()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/plot_xref_counts.md)
  : Plot Xref Counts

- [`pmc_summary()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/pmc_summary.md)
  : Get PubMed Central Summary

- [`print(`*`<oieb>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/print.oieb.md)
  : Print OMIM inventory report statistics

- [`print(`*`<suggested_regex>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/print.suggested_regex.md)
  : Print Method for Suggested Regex

- [`priority_sort()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/priority_sort.md)
  : Sort Vectors by Priority

- [`progress_bar-class`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/progress_bar-class.md)
  [`progress_bar`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/progress_bar-class.md)
  : Progress Bar (RefClass)

- [`pub_id_match`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/pub_id_match.md)
  : Prioritized List of Publication IDs & Regex's for Matching

- [`pubmed_summary()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/pubmed_summary.md)
  : Get PubMed Summary

- [`DO_pubs`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/pubs.md)
  [`ST_pubs`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/pubs.md) :
  Publication Info

  : pyDOID

  : Map Terms to Terms of Specified Namespace

  : Curation Queue: DOIDs to split?

- [`read_alliance()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/read_alliance.md)
  : Read Alliance .tsv.gz File

- [`read_ga()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/read_ga.md)
  : Read Google Analytics Exports

- [`read_omim()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/read_omim.md)
  : Read OMIM Data

- [`read_pubmed_txt()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/read_pubmed_txt.md)
  : Read in PubMed Citations (from txt file)

- [`replace_blank()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/replace_blank.md)
  : Replace Blanks with Specified Value

- [`replace_na(`*`<list>`*`)`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/replace_na.list.md)
  : \[DEPRECATED\] Replace NAs with specified value

- [`replace_null()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/replace_null.md)
  : Replace NULLs with specified value

- [`restore_names()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/restore_names.md)
  : Restore Element Names

- [`robot()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/robot.md)
  : Execute Robot Commands

- [`robot_query()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/robot_query.md)
  : Execute a SPARQL Query with ROBOT

- [`round_down()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/round_down.md)
  : Round Number Down

- [`round_up()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/round_up.md)
  : Round Number Up

- [`round_zero()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/round_zero.md)
  : Round Number to Zero

- [`sandwich_text()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/sandwich_text.md)
  : Sandwich Text Between Placeholders

- [`save_alliance_counts()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/save_alliance_counts.md)
  : Writes Alliance Counts to File

- [`search_pmc()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/search_pmc.md)
  : Search PubMed Central

- [`search_pubmed()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/search_pubmed.md)
  : Search PubMed

- [`set_scopus_keys()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/set_scopus_keys.md)
  : Set Keys for Scopus API Access

- [`suggest_regex()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/suggest_regex.md)
  : Suggest a Regular Expression That Will Match All Input

- [`theme_DO()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/theme_DO.md)
  : DO Theme for Stats Plots

- [`tidy_pub_records()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/tidy_pub_records.md)
  : Tidy Publication Records

- [`tidy_pubmed_summary()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/tidy_pubmed_summary.md)
  : Convert PubMed summary to tibble (DEPRECATED)

- [`tidy_sparql()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/tidy_sparql.md)
  : Tidy SPARQL Query

- [`to_curie()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/to_curie.md)
  : Convert URI to CURIE

- [`to_range()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/to_range.md)
  : Convert Vectors to Range String

- [`to_uri()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/to_uri.md)
  : Convert CURIE to URI

- [`today_datestamp()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/today_datestamp.md)
  : Today's Date Stamp

- [`unique_if_invariant()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/unique_if_invariant.md)
  : Return Unique Value for Invariant Vectors

- [`unnest_cross()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/unnest_cross.md)
  : Unnest data frame list columns

- [`unnest_mapping()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/unnest_mapping.md)
  : Unnest Mapping

- [`update_website_count_tables()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/update_website_count_tables.md)
  : Update Counts in DO Website HTML

- [`vctr_to_string()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/vctr_to_string.md)
  [`unique_to_string()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/vctr_to_string.md)
  : Convert Vectors to Strings

- [`wrap_onscreen()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/wrap_onscreen.md)
  : Wrap an On-screen Message

- [`write_graphml()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/write_graphml.md)
  : Write a Graph to .graphml File

- [`write_gs()`](https://allenbaron.github.io/DO.utils/reference/write_gs.md)
  : Write Data to a Google Sheet
